name: WebGLRenderingContext.compressedTexSubImage2D
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.compressedTexSubImage2D() method of the WebGL API specifies a two-dimensional sub-rectangle for a texture image in a compressed format.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
